outputs.output_descr: This project aims to reduce electricity demand due to households appliances, and in so doing also reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by developing and implementing S&L programs for 12 appliances. The project will also help overcome the barriers which are impeding the widespread uptake of efficient appliances.

project_descr: PIMS 3277 CC PDFB  Market Transformation Through Energy Efficiency Standards and Labelling of Appliances in South Africa
project_title: PIMS 3277 CC PDF B:  Appliance Labeling and Standards
